Text: Please note previous post. I have listened to this recording a number of times and the quality is definately pure digital and of excellent quality.  I have posted this CD here because whilst is is easy to find popular artists on TPB it can be difficult to find certain works by classical composers.

The recording may not be the best reviewed or one you may have heard of but you can obtain it easily if you want to as there lots of users on TPB.  Due lower popularity of classical works you are more likely to get it here.
